data.text: I naxa i yɛtɛ matɔxɔ tina xa fe ra,
I naxa i yɛtɛ matɔxɔ, a lu mixi gbɛtɛ nan xa i matɔxɔ.
Kote nan gɛmɛ ra, mɛyɛnyi fan binya,
Bɔɲɛ xa te xɔrɔxɔ, xɔnɛ fan magaaxu,
Marakɔrɔsi raminife kɛnɛ ma mixi xa tantanyi xa fe ra,
I xanuntenyi xa marakɔrɔsi xɔnɔ, kɔnɔ la na ra.
Mixi lugaxi mu wama hali kumi xɔn,
Xɛmɛ naxan a makuyama a xɔnyi ra,
Labundɛ nun surayi bɔɲɛ rasɛɛwama nɛ,
I naxa i dɛfanboore rabolo,
N ma di, bira lɔnni fɔxɔ ra alako n bɔɲɛ xa rafan n ma.
Xaxilima a yɛtɛ ratangama fe xɔrɔxɔɛ ma,
Mixi xa sɛɛkɛ se rasuxu a naxan taani xɔɲɛ bɛ,
I na i dɔxɔboore xɛɛbu i xui itexi ra gɛɛsɛgɛ gbe ra,
Ginɛ fitinɛtɔɛ luxi nɛ alɔ tunɛ di naxan fɛɛɲɛnma fa ra.
Na ginɛ mɔɔli raxanfe, na maniyama foye raxanfe ra,
Wure nan wure raluganma.
Mixi naxan mɛɛnima xɔrɛ bili ma, a a bogi donma nɛ.
Adama yatagi na ki naxɛ, na nan minima ye xɔɔra.
Aligiyama mu wasama mixi faxaxie ra,
Xɛɛma nun gbeti matoma tɛ ra,
I na maale din, a lagi bama nɛ a ma,
I xa i xa xuruse birin kolon a fanyi ra, i xa mɛɛni e ma,
barima bannaya mu buma tɛmui birin,
Xurusee na gɛ e balode ɲooge ra naxan toma fiili ma nun geya fari,
yɛxɛɛe xabe yailan dugi ra i bɛ,
si xiɲɛ findi i xa denbaya nun i xa konyie balo se ra.
